description:
Monitor your fortigate instances with grafana and prometheus via SNMP.


Tested with fortigate 1000D but should work well with other models.

targets.expr: fgHwSensorEntName{fgHwSensorEntName="PS1 Ambient Temp",instance=~"$instance"} / on(fgHwSensorEntIndex)  group_left(fgHwSensorEntValue) fgHwSensorEntValue
fgHwSensorEntName{fgHwSensorEntName="PS2 Ambient Temp",instance=~"$instance"} / on(fgHwSensorEntIndex)  group_left(fgHwSensorEntValue) fgHwSensorEntValue

title: Fortigate
